plot: Kevin and Ben become part of an alien abduction where they find themselves enslaved and forced to take part in televised galactic gladiatorial games.

Stuck as a genetic alien hodgepodge, Kevin returns to take it out on Ben, but in the heat of battle (with Grandpa Max and Gwen knocked cold on the sidelines), both are beamed away to become part of an alien slave master's televised gladiatorial games. Forced to fight together as teammates, and hampered by inconvenient Omnitrix timeouts, Ben must survive Kevin's virulent rage as well as alien fights forced upon them both as he figures out how to escape before the slave ship hyperdrives to another galaxy.—statmanjeff
